data.text: Ani gargaarsaaf gara Waaqaatti nan iyyadhe;
Yeroo rakkina kootiitti Gooftaa nan barbaaddadhe;
Yaa Waaqi, ani yommuun si yaadadhu nan aada;
Ati akka iji koo hin dunuunfanne goote;
Ani waaʼee bara durii,
ani halkaniin faarfannaa koo nan yaadadhe.
“Gooftaan bara baraan nama gataa?
Araarri isaa bara baraan badee?
Waaqni arjoomuu irraanfateeraa?
Anis, “Harki mirgaa kan Waaqa Waan Hundaa Olii
Ani hojii Waaqayyoo nan yaadadha;
Ani waan ati hojjette hunda irra deddeebiʼee nan yaada;
Yaa Waaqi, karaan kee qulqulluu dha.
Ati Waaqa hojii dinqii hojjettuu dha;
Irree kee cimaadhaan saba kee,
Yaa Waaqi, bishaanonni si argan;
Duumessi bishaan gad dhangalaase;
Bakakkaan kee bubbee hamaa keessaa dhagaʼame;
Daandiin kee galaana keessa,
Ati harka Museetii fi harka Arooniin,
